page.title: 08FARMING CUCKFIELD RURAL
page.content: We have a larger than average dairy farm in the area,Holmstead Farm,with 220milking Friesians and 100 followers on 356 acres (an average herd is 120 cows)These are cared for by two full time workers and a contract milker. Casual labour is employed as necessary The farmer is the tenent of an investment company. The farmworkers and retired workers live in tied cottages on the farm.Sidnye farm is a mixed farm of 400acres tenented from Borde Hill Estates,employing 5 full time workers.There is a flock of 300 sheep due to lamb in February and a herd of 70 beef cattle(Friesian x Her- eford)>Wheat,barley,oats and oilseed rape are also grown,in traditional fields bordered by hedges,and many trees and copses dot the landscape.A farm shop has been opened at Upper Sparks farm.
